snippet: Steady rain forced Nascar to postpone the Sprint Cup race at Daytona International Speedway on Saturday night.
abstract: Nascar postpones Coke Zero 400 auto race at Daytona International Speedway because of rain.
lead_paragraph: Steady rain forced Nascar to postpone the Sprint Cup race at Daytona International Speedway on Saturday night.
